description.en:
Ixian is a peer to peer encrypted data streaming platform, which handles a high volume of micro transactions.

About Ixian Platform and IxiCash

As remote work and social distancing are becoming the new norm, more people are relying on streaming services for communication. Traditional services rely on expensive infrastructure to handle millions of new users and amount of data transferred. This infrastructure needs constant maintenance and upgrades but is only being used at full capacity at certain peaks.

Ixian DLT - High throughput of micropayments with microfees

Ixian was built to overcome these issues. By leveraging the user’s hardware we can improve reliability and enable users to monetize their hardware and bandwidth, depending on network needs. Ixian relies on its users to form a secure and efficient network with no downtime.

Ixian S2 - Decentralized data streaming with incentives for node operators

You can already download and use the first decentralized app that utilizes Ixian technology, it’s called Spixi and it is a secure next generation chat app, with no central authority which can access your personal data.

Ixian is the kind of platform developers will want to use to build and monetize solutions that require scaling and secure data streaming capabilities. Services utilizing Ixian require smaller operating budgets and thus can be offered at competitive pricing. While paying less, users won’t need to worry about data leaks, privacy issues or censorship.

This infrastructure needs constant maintenance and upgrades but is only being used at full capacity at certain peaks.

Ixian DLT - High throughput of micropayments with microfees

Ixian was built to overcome these issues. By leveraging the user’s hardware we can improve reliability and enable users to monetize their hardware and bandwidth, depending on network needs. Ixian relies on its users to form a secure and efficient network with no downtime.

Ixian S2 - Decentralized data streaming with incentives for node operators

You can already download and use the first decentralized app that utilizes Ixian technology, it’s called Spixi and it is a secure next generation chat app, with no central authority which can access your personal data.

Ixian is the kind of platform developers will want to use to build and monetize solutions that require scaling and secure data streaming capabilities. Services utilizing Ixian require smaller operating budgets and thus can be offered at competitive pricing. While paying less, users won’t need to worry about data leaks, privacy issues or censorship.

Ixian is a peer to peer encrypted data streaming platform, which handles a high volume of micro transactions.

About Ixian Platform and IxiCash

As remote work and social distancing are becoming the new norm, more people are relying on streaming services for communication. status_updates.description:
🛰New $IXI LiteWallet Update available!

📡Download here: 
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-LiteWallet/releases/tag/v0.9.0e

Please update LiteWallet for best performance!

📢 To all node operators, please update your nodes to the latest maintenance release Ixian DLT v0.9.0e!

📡Download here: 
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.9.0e

Please update your nodes for best performance!

New updates available!

Ixian DLT v0.9.0d:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.9.0d

Ixian S2 v0.5.0b:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-S2/releases/tag/v0.5.0b

Ixian LiteWallet v0.9.0c:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-LiteWallet/releases/tag/v0.9.0c

Spixi v0.6.9:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Spixi/releases/tag/v0.6.9

Please update your nodes, LiteWallet and Spixi for best performance!

New updates available!

Ixian DLT v0.9.0b:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-DLT/releases/tag/v0.9.0b

Ixian S2 v0.5.0a:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-S2/releases/tag/v0.5.0a

Ixian LiteWallet v0.9.0a:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Ixian-LiteWallet/releases/tag/v0.9.0b

Spixi v0.6.8:
https://github.com/ProjectIxian/Spixi/releases/tag/v0.6.8

Please update your nodes, LiteWallet and Spixi for best performance.

Ixian DLT Beacon upgrade is here. 

It paves the way for the Ixiac Omega upgrade that will follow.
With this release we conclude the Omega testnet and would like to thank all of you that participated.

Please update your nodes and stay tuned for Ixiac Omega.

The Year of Omega

Ixian is celebrating its 6th birthday and we prepared a special article about our journey and what lies ahead:
https://medium.com/ixian/the-year-of-omega-ae212a6dc97f

We’re also proud to announce the public test pre-release of Ixian DLT v0.9.0, which includes the new Ixiac Omega consensus mechanism. Want to participate? More information in the article!

MineIXI.com is now the officially endorsed IXI mining pool, replacing the Kiramine EU and US pools.

Please update your miners and point them to https://www.mineixi.com as soon as possible.

In other mining pool related news, there is a brand new community lite pool launched: http://ixian.changeling.biz

Read more about the new pools:
https://medium.com/ixian/new-ixi-mining-pools-7eb6afd5acb7
